default.title: Vocapedia - Interactive Language Learning Platform
default.description: Master languages with interactive lessons, vocabulary lists, and tutorials. Your comprehensive alternative to traditional language learning platforms.

home.title: Vocapedia - Learn Languages with Interactive Lessons & Vocabulary
home.description: Discover comprehensive language learning with Vocapedia's interactive lessons, vocabulary builders, and tutorials. Experience innovative language education and accelerate your learning journey.

landing.title: Welcome to Vocapedia - Start Your Language Learning Journey!
landing.description: Join Vocapedia's interactive language learning platform. Create vocabulary lists, follow tutorials, practice with games, and master languages effectively with our comprehensive educational tools.

trends.description: Discover the most popular language lessons, vocabulary lists, and tutorials on Vocapedia. Follow trending educational content from our community.

search.description: Search through thousands of vocabulary lists, interactive lessons, and language tutorials on Vocapedia. Find the perfect learning content for your needs.

notes.description: Track your language learning progress, access personal notes, and manage your vocabulary collections on Vocapedia.
